MANUAL_REVIEW_LINT.memo: Our AI Lint Fixer gave it a shot, but some code style or build issues persist.
This usually means there's a tricky bit of code the AI couldn't automatically resolve.
Your feedback on what you were trying to build can help us improve the AI or fix this manually!

MANUAL_REVIEW_LINT_API_FAIL.memo: The AI Lint Fixer service seems to have had a hiccup communicating with its brain (the API).
This isn't related to your tool's code itself, but rather our AI infrastructure.
Please report this so our human engineers can take a look at the AI!

MANUAL_REVIEW_DEPS.memo: The AI Dependency Manager tried to sort out the necessary building blocks (NPM packages) but hit a snag.
Sometimes, new tools need libraries that require a bit of human finesse to integrate.
Letting us know about the tool you envisioned helps us get the dependencies right!

MANUAL_REVIEW_CI_ERROR.memo: Oops! It looks like our internal CI (Continuous Integration) process had an unexpected issue.
This is usually a hiccup on our end, not with the tool you designed.
Reporting this helps our team fix the CI pipeline. Thanks!

MANUAL_REVIEW_VPR_UNKNOWN.memo: The automated validation for your tool didn't complete as expected, and the reason isn't immediately clear.
This requires a human to look at the logs and see what went sideways.
Details about the tool you were trying to build would be very helpful for our investigation!

MANUAL_REVIEW_TIMEOUT.memo: The automated build process took longer than expected and timed out.
Sometimes AI generation or complex checks can be slow. We're working on optimizing this!
Your feedback on the tool can help us understand if complexity was a factor.

DEFAULT_MANUAL_REVIEW.memo: The automated build for your tool couldn't be completed.
AI is a powerful assistant, but sometimes human expertise is needed to get things just right.
Please help us improve by providing details about the tool you were trying to create.
